title: Episode #1.1473
plot: Karen updates Bill that she did not reveal to anyone that a misconception caused Thorne to break-up with Macy. However, Karen intends to make sure to only enter marriage if she is absolutely certain that Thorne only loves her. Then, Thorne stops by with flowers and they wonder about the outcome of paternity test. Still bickering, Stephanie and Brooke arrive at the hospital. Eric and Sheila show up next. Brooke shares a private moment with Ridge while Taylor is parking the car. They rehash how special it was to deliver the baby girl in the mountains. Finally, the mother, the potential fathers and their respective spouses and ex assemble in Dr. Peters' office. Tracy explains that the test results were conclusive and that they found several genetic markers in the baby that one of the men has. Brooke implores Dr. Peters to reveal the answer to her most burning question: "Who is the father of my baby?"
writers: William J. Bell, John F. Smith, Bradley Bell
stars: Kimberlin Brown, Susan Flannery, Joanna Johnson
